about_the_game:
INTENSE TACTICAL GUN COMBAT


The Math Problem Killer is about intense close quarter gun fighting. You are a hostage rescue operator with the Tactical Response Unit and your mission is to rescue the hostage being held at the end of several dungeons. You will need to fight your way through each room of these dungeons, and each room will be filled with highly lethal adversaries. You will need to watch you right, left, font and back. You will need to peak around corners, and aim down your pistol's sights. And if you make one mistake, and get hit once, you will die and respawn at the checkpoint at the beginning of the room. This game is unforgiving, so it is time to get tactical. Good luck special agent!

ONE TACTICAL RESPONSE UNIT SPECIAL AGENT AGAINST AN ARMY OF GANG MEMBERS


A vicious gang, known as The Math Problem Killer Gang, named after their sadistic leader, is terrorizing the city of New Columbia. In response to the gang's evil actions, an elite Task Force has arrived to combat the gang. You are part of this task force as a member of the Task Force's elite Tactical Response Unit. These are an elite group of tactical operators that are chosen to go on the most dangerous missions including raids to hostage rescue.

In the first chapter of the game, missions 1-12, you will be conducting hostage rescue operations. In each mission, you will learn about an innocent civilian that has been taken hostage by the ruthless and sadistic Math Problem Killer Gang. You will then be sent inside one of their strongholds to rescue the hostage. In each stronghold you will encounter over 90 heavily armed gang members. Your only weapon will be you Task Force issued silenced pistol.

You will need to fight your way through the dungeon to the very end to reach the hostage. Each dungeon is composed of 5-7 rooms. Each room will be a challenging gunfight.

ONE HIT...AND YOUR DEAD


The Math Problem Killer is a high consequence tactical action game. That means if you get hit once, you are killed and must restart at the checkpoint at the beginning of the room. You must clear the entire room without getting hit once, in order to reach the next checkpoint. This game is all about tactics.

OPTIONAL RECORDINGS LEFT BY THE MATH PROBLEM KILLER


As you progress through the Math Problem Killer Gang's strongholds, you will find recordings left by the leader of the gang, The Math Problem Killer. The Math Problem Killer is a sadistic and violent monster. He enjoys stalking, and torturing his victims. He also enjoys bragging about his exploits even more. Throughout each dungeon you will find recordings left by the killer. In each recording, he will recount with delight the various methods he employed to capture and torture his victims. These recordings include disturbing accountings of murder and violence towards, men, women and children. Listening to these recordings is ENTIRELY OPTIONAL. Your only objective is the rescue of the hostage at the end of the level. If you do not want to listen to recordings left by a deranged serial killer, you do not have to.

content_descriptors.notes:
- The Math Problem Killer is an action first person shooter, the player will need to shoot enemies with a pistol
- During game levels, the player has the option to listen to recordings produced by the serial killer. Some of these recordings may be unsettling for some players.  The Serial Killer's recordings will contain implied and explicit descriptions of stalking, mutilations, rape, and violence against children, women, and men.

short_description: The Math Problem Killer is a first-person tactical shooter where you play as a highly skilled agent sent on intense hostage rescue missions. With one-hit kills adding to the realism and challenge, you must use strategy and precision to save hostages and eliminate threats.
